QuestData.Title: Message from the Management
QuestData.Description:
<This letter from Priscilla Ashvane to her employees appears to be posted all over the foundry.
It sounds like Cagney's information was accurate, Ashvane is working their people around the clock.
Priscilla mentions a Forgemaster Farthing and a Taskmaster Williams. They may have more information about her plans.>
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Head of House Ashvane and president of the Ashvane Trading Company.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect Priscilla's Orders from Forgemaster Farthing and Taskmaster Williams.
QuestData.RewardText: Most folks workin' for the Ashvane Trading Company don't know how rotten they are, or don't have any other choice.$B$BThe sooner we take down Priscilla the better.
